title: Garden of Restoration

lines.raw: [C]In this [Am]world, em[C]bittered with [F]hate, through the [C]thousands of [F]years, [Em] [G7]
[C]Father was [F]searching to [C]find one tri[Am]umphant in [Dm]heart; [G] [G7]
[C]There, where He [G]struggled be[C]hold, foot[F]prints [Em]stained with [Am]blood; [Dm] [G7]
[C]Such love is [F]given to [C6]us in [Em]His provi[Am]dence; [Dm]
[C]Such love is [F]given to [C]us in [Am]His [F]provi[Dm]dence. [C]

tokens.lyric: Here we find the flower of joy in the freedom of God;

lines.raw: Here we find the flower of joy in the freedom of God;

tokens.lyric: His garden blesses the world with the blooming of hope;

lines.raw: His garden blesses the world with the blooming of hope;

tokens.lyric: Fragrant perfume of His will fills us all with joy;

lines.raw: Fragrant perfume of His will fills us all with joy;

tokens.lyric: Such life fulfills all the dreams of our Father's desire,

lines.raw: Such life fulfills all the dreams of our Father's desire,

tokens.lyric: Such life fulfills all the dreams of our Father's desire.

lines.raw: Such life fulfills all the dreams of our Father's desire.

tokens.lyric: Fresh bouquets of happiness grow, gently tossed in the breeze;

lines.raw: Fresh bouquets of happiness grow, gently tossed in the breeze;

tokens.lyric: Our home eternal and true is a haven of joy;

lines.raw: Our home eternal and true is a haven of joy;

tokens.lyric: Here in such beauty divine, we shall always live;

lines.raw: Here in such beauty divine, we shall always live;

tokens.lyric: Such is the gift of the Lord, Father's heavenly land;

lines.raw: Such is the gift of the Lord, Father's heavenly land;

tokens.lyric: Such is the gift of the Lord, Father's heavenly land.

lines.raw: Such is the gift of the Lord, Father's heavenly land.

tokens.lyric: God's eternal providence is the Kingdom on earth;

lines.raw: God's eternal providence is the Kingdom on earth;

tokens.lyric: On earth He wanted to see His true garden in bloom,

lines.raw: On earth He wanted to see His true garden in bloom,

tokens.lyric: Filled with perfume of the heart, spread His glorious joy;

lines.raw: Filled with perfume of the heart, spread His glorious joy;

tokens.lyric: Such is the glory to come, crowning all of the world,

lines.raw: Such is the glory to come, crowning all of the world,

tokens.lyric: Such is the glory to come, crowning all of the world.

lines.raw: Such is the glory to come, crowning all of the world.
